page.title: 06Droitwich- Events 1985
page.content: {Motorway Closure}_The M5 motorway which runs to the East of Droitwich linking our industry and commerce with the rest of the motorway system is to be widened.Built in the early 1960s with only 4 lanes it is to be developed to six lanes.Firstly, it has to be lit to facilitate the work. Next the bridges and interchanges will be widened or altered before the actual widening process begins causing many hold-ups and diversions for the next 3_5 years. {Droitwich Festival}_ an Arts festival first held in June 1985 to include concerts,shows and exhibitions,pavement artists,magic and BMX racing.It also attracted some 'fringe' events and,following its success,it is hoped it will become a biennial event.The festival is organised by Droitwich Town Council.
